programme.title: Toidujutud
programme.desc: Ürgsest toiduvalmistamisviisist on nüüdseks saanud peen kunst ja tehnoloogia on grillimise lihtsamaks muutnud. Grillimine tähendab seda, kui suuri lihatükke või terveid loomi madalal temperatuuril mitu tundi mooritakse ja suitsutatakse. Ameerikas on grillimine suviti eriti populaarne.

programme.title: Ninasarvikute orbudekodu
programme.desc: Aafrika esimene ninasarvikute orbudekodu on paik, kus saavad uue võimaluse väikesed ninasarvikud, kelle emad on surnud, enamasti salaküttide käe läbi. Varase eluea dramaatilistest sündmustest üle saamiseks läheb kaua aega ja veel kauem tuleb tööd teha selle nimel, et neid saaks jälle loodusesse tagasi lasta. Inimestele, kes ninasarvikute eest hoolitsevad, on see maailm täis rõõmsaid ja kurbi hetki, suuri riske ning tohutuid võite. Väikesed ninasarvikud, kes on salaküttide käe läbi ilma emata jäänud, nõuavad palju hoolt ja vaeva. Hiljuti orbudekodusse toodud Nandi on stressis ja jagab kõigile muhke ning sinikaid, Thula aga vajab suurt abi arstidelt. Kas õnnestub talle nägemine tagasi anda?

programme.title: Osooni lood
Hüübi jälgimine varjest
programme.desc: "Osoon" käis koos ornitoloog Mati Kosega linnuvarjes, et näha väga varjatud eluviisiga ööhämaruses toimetavat hüüpi. Rahvasuus kutsutakse seda lindu ka ööhirmutajaks ja sookuradiks, küllap ööpimedusest kostva madala käriseva, pisut hirmutava hääle pärast. Tegemist on vähearvuka linnuliigiga, pesitsusajal 300-500 paari, talveks jäävad siia vaid väga üksikud isendid. Autor Kristo Elias.

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Iga mõne kilomeetri järel ilmub meie teele kas üksik elevant või terve londiliste kari. Pole ka ime, sest Botswana selles piirkonnas elab neid umbes 120 000. Kui elevandid on ees piisavalt kaugel, siis peatume ja ootame. Kui nad aga ilmuvad äkitselt kusagilt puude ja põõsaste vahelt auto vahetusse lähedusse, siis vajutame vaid gaasipedaali, sest metsikute elevantide rünnakud autode vastu ei ole sugugi harvad. Aafrikas seiklesid Peeter Vähi ja Tiina Jokinen.

programme.title: Tasakaalu retsept
La receta del equilibrio
programme.desc: Hispaania režissööri Óscar Bernàceri 2020. aastal valminud dokumentaalfilm Ricard Camarenast, kahe Michelini tärniga pärjatud meisterkokast. Kui tekib võimalus restoranid pärast Covid-19 tõttu aset leidnud pikki sulgemisi taas avada, seisab Camarena silmitsi suurte raskustega. València’s aiad aga annavad endist viisi saaki ja looduse ringkäik jätkub häirimatus rahus.

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Rathil ja Zörgiebelil pole tõendeid, et Benda mõrvareid paljastada. Charlotte teeb fantoomi osas olulise avastuse, mis seab tema elu ohtu.

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Politsei on fantoomi isiku välja selgitanud. Litten ja Charlotte püüavad Gretat päästa, iga minut on arvel. Nyssen saab New Yorgist teada, et börsikursid langevad järsult.(n)

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Juba aegade algusest on päkapikud oma võluväega inimesi abistanud. Kord aastas, jõuluõhtul, kohtus päkapikkude kuningas ühe väljavalituga inimeste seast. Kuid ühel saja aasta tagusel jõuluõhtul läks midagi väga valesti - sestpeale ei ole inimeste ja päkapikurahva vahel läbikäimist olnud. Päkapikulastele jagatakse pidulikult kätte amuletid, kuid Tinka oma ei muuda värvi. Viimaks saab ta teada suure saladuse oma päritolu kohta. Astrid ja Lasse kolivad koos isaga vanaema juurde elama.(n)

programme.desc: Meditsiininõukogu hinnang kohustab Martinit käima kolmel täienduskursusel, alustades flebotoomiast. Louisa keskendub uuele ametile laste ja noorukite nõustajana. Berti pahameeleks palkab Al Caitlini ja tunnistab üles, et tegi abieluettepaneku kogemata.(n)

programme.title: Osoon
programme.sub-title: Linnugripi oht; Eesti virmalised; Haned ja luiged
programme.desc: Kevadine lindude saabumine on alati ilus ja erutav, aga lindude rändega võivad kaasneda ka ohud. Linnugripp on üks ohtlik loomataud, millega kaasneb massiline lindude haigestumine ja suur suremus. Kuidas linnugripp levib kodulindudele? Virmalised on hämmastav loodusnähtus, sellest müstilisest vaatepildist osasaamiseks ollakse valmis sõitma põhjapolaarjoone taha. Selgub, et virmalisi on võimalik näha ka Eestis, kui olla õigel ajal õiges kohas. Valgusemäng ei pruugi olla nii võimas kui põhjapoolusel, aga ikka oma Eestimaa taevas. Meie püüame virmalisi Hiiumaa põhjarannikul Sääre ninas. Laululuik on metsatundra ja taigavööndi järvede elanik. Meil on laululuik eelkõige läbirändaja, pesitsusest siinmail on teada vaid üksikuid juhtumeid. Just rändeajal saame neid majesteetlikke linde jälgida. Autorid Sander Loite, Kristo Elias ja Karl Adami. Režissöör Keiti Väliste, operaatorid Madis Reimund, Ants Tammik ja Karl Adami, helirežissöör Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent Õie Arusoo.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Täna sõidab Ronx jälle Jan Vanni kiirabibrigaadis. Xand läheb trenni ja kõik näevad kaksikute suurepäraseid tantsu- ja lauluoskusi!(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Päkapikud kaevavad suure hooga kuningriiki üles, et varandust leida.(n)

programme.title: Jõulutöökoda
programme.desc: Vahva loovust arendav meisterdamissari lastele. Norra kunstik ja jutuvestja Øistein Kristiansen õpetab, kuidas ise jõulukinke, -kaarte ja -ehteid valmistada ning need oma käega leidlikult ja toredasti ära pakkida. Täna meisterdame reisikuudi, millega on mugav oma koera igale poole kaasa võtta.(n)

programme.title: Tinka jõulumuinaslugu
programme.desc: Juba aegade algusest on päkapikud oma võluväega inimesi abistanud. Kord aastas, jõuluõhtul, kohtus päkapikkude kuningas ühe väljavalituga inimeste seast. Kuid ühel saja aasta tagusel jõuluõhtul läks midagi väga valesti - sestpeale ei ole inimeste ja päkapikurahva vahel läbikäimist olnud. Päkapikulastele jagatakse pidulikult kätte amuletid, kuid Tinka oma ei muuda värvi. Viimaks saab ta teada suure saladuse oma päritolu kohta. Astrid ja Lasse kolivad koos isaga vanaema juurde elama.(n)

programme.title: NOVA

programme.title: Jõulutaadi suured saladused
programme.desc: Mis sa arvad, kuidas ikkagi jõuab jõuluvana üheainsa õhtu jooksul kõigi maailma laste juurde kinke jagama? Mitu põhjapõtra on tema saani ees ja mitu päkapikust abilist elab tema võlulossis kaugel lumises Põhjalas? Ja kas jõulutaat vahel puhkusel ka käib? Kõigile neile ja veel paljudele teistele küsimustele leiad vastuse sellest südamlikust lastesarjast, mis toob igasse koju vahvaid laule ning mõnusa sooja jõulutuju.(n)

programme.title: Koerad ei kanna pükse
Koirat eivät käytä housuja
programme.desc: R: Jukka-Pekka Valkeapää. Õnnetuses oma naise kaotanud Juha (Pekka Strang) on aastaid elanud leinas. Juhuslik kohtumine sadomaso dominaatriksi Monaga (Krista Kosonen) pöörab aga mehe elu pea peale. Piits ja lateks, ketid, alandus ja valuvõtted köidavad Juha meeli ja pakuvad hingehaavadele alternatiivi. Ühelt poolt vägivalda, teisalt põhjamaiselt kohmakat õrnust ja musta huumorit pakkuv armastuslugu. Linastus Cannes´is erikava „Directors´ Fortnight” raames, kodusel Jussi filmiauhinna jagamisel oli nomineeritud kümnes kategoorias.(n)

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A super hero works for civil security in Los Angeles, and due to his recklessness causes millions of dollars worth of damages which he then tries to make up for by improving his image.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Former CIA operative Peter Devereaux (Pierce Brosnan) returns to work in order to take on a very personal mission. He soon finds himself in the midst of a fierce battle with a former pupil in a scenario involving senior officers in the agency and related to the Russian presidential election.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: A group of friends decide to spend the weekend in a cabin in the woods, but they stumble on terrible things that happen to them.

programme.title: Before We Go
programme.desc: A street musician crosses paths with a married woman after she misses her train, as he offers to help her they open up to each other and face their hidden fears.

programme.title: Edison
programme.desc: After encountering a den of degenerate police officers, a young journalist makes partners with a reporter and an investigator, before he can fully realize the extent of the criminality around him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is involved in a bombing in the Kremlin, Ethan Hunt and his team are trying to pursue the terrorist Hendricks who have access to the secret codes of Russian nuclear weapons, prompting the US president to launch the Ghost Protocol program, which makes Ethan and his team to take responsibility for the bombing while allowing them to escape to find those responsible.

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Willie, Joe and Albert are three retired senior citizens who are desperate to find money. As things get worse and the circumstances become more complicated, they begin to plan a bank robbery.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A group of famous illusionists called the "Four Horsemen" are being chased by an FBI agent and an Interpol detective after they pull off major bank heists during their performances and shower the audience with money.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A love triangle brings together the brilliant medical student Michael, the attractive and sophisticated Ana, and the renowned photojournalist Chris. As the two men clash over Ana, they've to come together when public chaos follows the crumbling of the Ottoman Empire.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Now that a cure is found to treat mutations, X-Men are divided between Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a league of mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: When (Rebecca) leaves home, she thought she left also her childhood fears, and while she grows up, she remained not sure what is real or what is not when the lights get out. programme.desc: Cynical veteran Nathan Algren is hired to train a Japanese army to use firearms against the traditionalist Samurai. After being taken hostage by the Samurai after a bloody confrontation, he grows to respect their culture and joins their ranks.(n)

programme.desc: The film traces the emergence of Batman, as he travels to the Far East to study martial arts. He soon discovers about the League of Shadows, whose purpose is to eradicate the crime-ridden city of Gotham as it plunges into wickedness. Batman then starts his quest to combat corruption.(n)

programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.(n)

programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.(n)

programme.desc: Baby Doll is detained in the mental hospital by her step-father. During an operation, she gets into a fantasy world in her head, where she attempts to escape her prison with four other girls and faces strange creatures.

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: During the American Civil War, Lt. John Dunbar befriends an Indian tribe and meets a white woman who was raised by them. He sheds his old ways as he comes to believe in their cause.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: Hero and Claudio are to be married in one week. For some amusement, they convince Don Pedro to prepare a lover's trap for Benedick and Beatrice.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: With both her professional and personal life coming to a standstill, Emily decides to decompress by going on a vacation that she planned with her now former boyfriend. As she convinces her overprotective mother to accompany her, they soon find themselves in an adventure when they get kidnapped.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.

programme.title: Arbitrage
programme.desc: Hedge-fund magnate and billionaire Robert Miller is desperate to sell off his fraud-laden trading empire before the cracks are exposed, but things get complicated when he becomes embroiled in a bloody cover-up that threatens to unravel his business plans as well as his family.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. Eventually, he launches a website with his friend Eduardo that allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy.

A highly intelligent student wants to enroll in Harvard, but doesn't have the tuition fees. He moves with his friends to Las Vegas, where they us their card counting skills to win large amounts of cash in the casinos of the city.

programme.desc: After serving a long prison term, Gordon Gekko finds himself out of the financial world he once controlled. He forms an alliance with Jake, his daughter's fiance, who sees him as a father figure and tries to follow Gordon's footsteps.

programme.title: Need for Speed

programme.title: Pompeii

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2

programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: Santa in Training
programme.desc: With a tradition for a new Santa to take over every 30 years, a vengeful elf causes a mix-up during the choosing of the new Santa, causing the candidate to be a Christmas-hating man who is less than willing to let his negative feelings towards the holiday go.

programme.title: Brutal Bridesmaids
programme.desc: As the soon-to-be bride Jessica begins to notice strange occurrences that are happening to her, she suspects that one of her bridesmaids is behind it.

programme.title: The Lost Husband
programme.desc: After her husband dies, Libby is forced to move in with her kids to her aunt's farm in Texas, where she struggles to adapt to a new life and get over her pain.

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.

programme.title: Beirut Blast: The Story Of Warehouse 12
Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: Police Chief Lassiter is ambushed and left for dead, after which Shawn and Gus leave San Francisco to help him, only to find themselves unwelcome in Santa Barbara as they contemplate a scheme to unravel a case about the supernatural.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation on the road, a single mother and her son find themselves stalked by a deranged man who's hellbent on teaching them fatal lessons.

programme.title: Possessor
programme.desc: As a part of an organization that uses technology to take over people's bodies and force them to commit murder, Tasya Vos soon finds herself crumbling under the mental strain, which threatens to leave her stranded in the mind of one of those possessed, with the possible loss of her own identity.

programme.title: The Titan
programme.desc: With Earth slowly becoming inhabitable, humanity has started looking to space for a new place to live. An experiment is launched to manage human evolution in a way that adapts to a new life in space, but tampering with evolution comes at a steep price.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.

programme.title: Fit for a Prince
programme.desc: After being hired by an opulent family to design the ladies' attire for a forthcoming charity event that the family is organizing, Cindy ends up meeting a prince who falls for her.

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.

programme.title: 2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.

programme.title: Cheerleader Abduction
programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2015 film (Sicario), where the drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border.

programme.title: Paydirt
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, a parolee goes back to his old ways as he reunites his old crew to recover money that was stolen during a botched DEA raid. However, they have to work to evade the retired sheriff pursuing them.

programme.title: Truly, Madly, Sweetly
programme.desc: When a sudden inheritance brings them together, Natalie and Eric connect while renovating the historical bakery they inherited in the hope to kickstart a flourishing business. But despite their obvious feelings, Natalie remains hesitant to change their relationship from professional to romantic.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.

programme.title: Secrets in the Woods
programme.desc: While on a romantic trip with her boyfriend in the woods, Sandra uncovers a dark secret about his father.

programme.title: Love in Winterland
programme.desc: As Ally competes on a dating show, she returns to her hometown of Winterland, where she has to face her high school sweetheart, while dealing with the charming bachelor from the show.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: A Dash of Love

programme.desc: In a battle, Jumbo, the King's elephant, loses both of his parents. When he attempts to distract himself from his sadness by embarking on a series of escapades, he makes a decision that completely changes his life.(n)

programme.title: Micropolis
programme.desc: Micropolis is the theme park that the Mongoose call home. It's peaceful and idyllic, until it comes under fire when Rascal, the leader of the shrews, sets his eyes on it and attempts to kill its inhabitants to seize control.(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep Smile
programme.desc: As Grumbo shoulders the responsibility of putting a weird theory to practice, Fancy, Chloe, and Victoria resent those attempts. Grambo pulls out all the stops to prove correct.(n)

programme.title: Ho Ho Animals
programme.desc: In a remote forest, a group of animals that includes a large number of bears and monkeys comes together to embark on a series of thrilling adventures.(n)

programme.title: Nur And The Dragon Temple
programme.desc: Nur and her parents move to China, where she makes new friends. While they're celebrating Guo's birthday in an amusement park, they discover that their friend is missing and they have to cross a maze and go through the nine gates of the dragon to find him.(n)

programme.title: Pirates in Callao
programme.desc: Alberto, gets lost on a school trip to a fort called El Real Felipe in Callao, and he enters a portal that sends him to the 17th century. He discovers that Dutch pirates will attack Callao under Jacques L'Hermite, who wants to steal the king's gold and invade Callao.(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: On the Amazon river, a documentary crew is set upon by a dangerous man who claims to know the location of the tribe they want to film. However, as the man misleads them into dangerous territory, they come to discover that he is on the hunt for a deadly Anaconda, placing them all in peril.

programme.title: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: The story follows the daring covert operation 'X-ray' where a team of spies is sent by American General Douglas MacArthur to gather intelligence on North Korean defenses before the launch of the Incheon Landing Operation.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: When Josh Lambert is possessed by an evil spirit, his family strives to save him, as they discover mysterious childhood secrets that draws them back to the spirit world.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: When jewel thief Miles Logan steals a huge diamond, he manages to hide it before he gets arrested. After serving two years in jail, he goes to retrieve the diamond, only to find out that the place where he hid it is now a police station.

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: With his mother in a coma, young Harper believes his stepfather to be the one behind it, prompting him to enter a pact with a hooligan to exact revenge on his stepfather.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: An infamous mafia family, the Manzonis, headed by Giovanni Manzoni (Robert De Niro) is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program. Written and directed by the man who made "The Fifth Element" and "Lé The Professional.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: On the Amazon river, a documentary crew is set upon by a dangerous man who claims to know the location of the tribe they want to film. However, as the man misleads them into dangerous territory, they come to discover that he is on the hunt for a deadly Anaconda, placing them all in peril.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time at Christmas
programme.desc: In the lead up to Christmas, the town of Woodridge gets terrorized by a murderous couple dressed as Santa and Mrs. Claus. As fear grips the town and the death toll climbs up, a cop tries to find the murderers and discover their plot that seems to have a young girl at its center.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it in order to beat the game and return to the real world.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: DC policeman Cale (Channing Tatum) is on a White House tour with his daughter when it is attacked by heavily armed paramilitary invaders. He must save his daughter and the President of the United States, though the odds are stacked against him.

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: With his mother in a coma, young Harper believes his stepfather to be the one behind it, prompting him to enter a pact with a hooligan to exact revenge on his stepfather.

programme.title: The Super
programme.desc: When a former cop becomes the superintendent of an upscale building in New York, he is quick to start investigating the mysterious disappearances that take place in the building. Narrowing his suspect pool down to one man, he must race to uncover the truth as his own daughters land in peril.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: When jewel thief Miles Logan steals a huge diamond, he manages to hide it before he gets arrested. After serving two years in jail, he goes to retrieve the diamond, only to find out that the place where he hid it is now a police station.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Mike and Marcus still work together as narcotics cops in Miami, but Mike is hiding the fact that he is dating Marcus's sister. Their boss, Captain Howard, gives them a new assignment regarding the flow of ecstasy pills into Miami.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: International spy Ethan Renner (Kevin Costner) decides to leave his risky life behind to build a stronger relationship with his daughter and wife. but Ethan has to complete one final mission before he retires , to catch the most dangerous terrorist in the world, while taking care of his daughter.

programme.title: Welcome Home
programme.desc: A couple who are trying to mend their relationship, spend a weekend at a vacation rental home in the Italian countryside, only to find themselves the target of the homeowner's evil plans.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.title: Little Manhattan
programme.desc: When Gabe reunites with his former kindergarten classmate Rosemary, he quickly finds himself developing a crush on her. As he tries to figure out how to woo her, his new feelings leave him as confused as his parents' imminent divorce.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Being the first human being born on Mars, Gardner Elliot reads a lot about Earth, his mother's planet. After 16 years, he is eager to visit Earth to get to experience its wonders himself, hoping to learn how he came into being. Meanwhile, he strikes an online friendship with a girl on Earth.

programme.title: King of Thieves
programme.desc: Based on a true story of a crew of retired thieves who plan to pull off a major heist in London's jewelry district, but things take an unexpected turn when greed gets in the way.

programme.title: Please Stand By
programme.desc: Wendy is a brilliant young woman with autism living in a group home in the care of Scottie who helps her to control her anger fits. Her sister, Audrey, visits her but refuses Wendy’s request to take her home, fearing for her baby, Ruby. Determined to prove her worth, Wendy sets out on an adventure to complete and deliver her 469-page Start Trek script to Paramount Pictures, competing for $100,000.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Cody Maverick is a teenage penguin, who is looking forward to the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship. He wants to win the challenging competition, and along his journey meets the wise Geek, who teaches him a thing or two about life.

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: In the Montana wilderness, estranged father and son, David and Carl, struggle to connect as they go on a hunting trip. But the trip soon takes a dangerous turn when they encounter a bear, leaving them both injured and fighting for their lives.
